title: Laboratory Facilities
body:
Innovation Through Practice

At Amer Maharaja P.G. College, we believe that true scientific understanding comes from hands-on experimentation. Our laboratories are designed to meet the rigorous standards of the 2026 academic curriculum, providing students with the tools and technology needed to turn theoretical concepts into practical knowledge.

Specialized Labs

  • Physics Lab: Equipped with advanced apparatus for mechanics, optics, and electronics experiments.
  • Chemistry Lab: A state-of-the-art facility featuring modern glassware, chemical reagents, and safety equipment for organic and inorganic analysis.
  • Zoology & Botany Labs: Featuring high-resolution microscopes, preserved specimens, and botanical charts for life science research.
  • Computer Lab: A high-speed network of 50+ terminals with the latest software for programming, data analysis, and accounting.

Safety and Excellence

Safety is our top priority. Each lab is equipped with fire extinguishers, first-aid kits, and proper ventilation systems. Under the guidance of experienced lab assistants and faculty, students learn to handle equipment with precision and care. Regular workshops are conducted to introduce students to the latest experimental techniques and industrial safety protocols, ensuring they are well-prepared for professional careers in science and technology.
